title: Magic Quiver
summaries: The Magic Quiver is a Hardmode accessory that boosts arrows and Stakes. It is dropped with a 2.5*1/40 (2.5%) / 1.25*1/80 (1.25%) chance from Skeleton Archers in the Cavern layer.
It grants the following boosts to arrows and Stakes:

• +10% damage
  • +100% velocity (does not affect Jester's, Ichor, and Venom Arrows, or Stakes)
  • +20% chance not to consume ammo
It will also increase the knockback of all arrow- and Stake-firing weapons by 10%.
It also affects the knockback of some arrow- and Stake-firing weapons by between around âˆ’40% and +9%; see notes.

Extra arrow velocity works by setting the arrow's <linked>extra updates</linked> value to 1. This does not affect Jester's Arrows, Ichor Arrows, Venom Arrows, or Stakes, as they already have an extra updates value of 1 (or greater).
